name: totd_tracks_by_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trackmania.
Tool description: Get Stats, Matches and Leaderboards from Trackmania (Unofficial).
API description: Retrieves the Track of the Day (TOTD) tracks for a given month and year from the Trackmania API.

month.description: The month for which to retrieve TOTD tracks.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve TOTD tracks.
